_sText:
v2 changes:

Musiknade has musik now
addet some lights at t zone at beginning

Fixed megabug where you can  get to Terrorist side by obtaining HEALNADE! and then jump to t side

This is my next map creation:

Story: While exploring deathrun_kristallpalast some Researcher found a hidden Switch behind a Crystalwall. It opened a secrep portal to its main Part that is even deeper in the underground. However after they start to explore inide they died through a very strange thing but looked really nice

Description: Fortress in an unknown dimension

contains 16 traps +3 uncontrollable things

1. Trap: Lightning Spell
2. Trap at same position: Fire Beam
3. Noob box
4. Giga Flare
5. Delta Force
6. Blood Portal
7. Spark Wave
8. Blood Star
9. Burning Crystal
10. Ground Breaks
11. Noob Box2
12. Hell Wall
13. Fire Ring
14. Fire Gems
15. Rotating Yewel
16. Ragnara Giga Trap

Uncontrollable: 2x Breaking ground and Hell Circle energy beams

5 secret nades:

1. Musiknade (music is removed until valve fix this)
2. Inferno Nade
3. Heal nade ( hardest to get)
4. Kaleidoskop Nade
5. Ultranade (hard to get too)

3minigames:

Bhop
Knive Arena
Dark Maze

Miscs:

Double Pushing is not possible
Afk Killer at start
64 CT SpawnPoints
3 T Spawns

Beware: im sure there is the one or other trap i forgot to write here


Have fun
And if you find Bugs Report plz
